title: Topic 001 Question 060
body: A company is running their webshop on Google Kubernetes Engine and wants to analyze customer transactions in BigQuery. You need to ensure that no credit card numbers are stored in BigQuery
options: Create a BigQuery view with regular expressions matching credit card numbers to query and delete affected rows.
Use the Cloud Data Loss Prevention API to redact related infoTypes before data is ingested into BigQuery.
Leverage Security Command Center to scan for the assets of type Credit Card Number in BigQuery.
Enable Cloud Identity-Aware Proxy to filter out credit card numbers before storing the logs in BigQuery.
